forum.content: So yes people asked about how to improve their English and this is my answer. My English journey started five years ago with Jane Austen, William Shakespeare and J RR Tolkien. I am not a fan of literature but I forced myself to immerse within it. As u can see that I checked through every single words that I don't understand in the text. The time was harsh and hellish but it somehow changed my life. If ur asking me how to improve English, I would simply just say: go to bookstore and pick up any book written in English even Twilight. Just start reading and speak it out.
forum.title: This reminds me how my English journey was started
